attributes.action: remove the role of Community Support Officer altogether in favour of properly trained & recruited police officers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The introduction of Community Support Officers reflects an erosion of the integrity of the police force. It had been promised that CSO would never have powers of arrest, that changed soon enough. We are simply witnessing lower salaried police officers with incorrect attitude and training. CS officers are typically recruited from traffic wardens & parking attendants.
